summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing (likely a bail application) in the U.S. v. Maxwell case to other defense team members. It serves as a procedural notification regarding case filings and updates to the attorney's contact information.

events.title: ECF Filing in U.S. v. Maxwell
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim files a document (likely a bail application) electronically with the court in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case (S2 20 Cr. 330).
It forwards a courtesy copy of an afternoon ECF filing, with an attached file named 'Bail_Application_11321.pdf', suggesting a bail-related motion was filed.
The email is sent to other defense team members: Christian Everdel, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
Sternheim includes a notice of her new office address and preferred email address, indicating a change in her professional contact information.
